snippet.title: Blood will be Spilled - Trailer (summer 2018)
snippet.description:
Blood will be Spilled is a narrative focused 2D spaghetti western action platformer with turn-based combat, taking place in a completely hand-drawn harsh world inhabited by insects.

Starring Elias Toufexis (Deus Ex, Assassin’s Creed, Splinter Cell) as the mosquito bounty hunter Jack.

Website:     http://www.bloodwillbespilled.com
Steam:        https://store.steampowered.com/app/880300/
Twitter:       https://twitter.com/blwbs
Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/bloodwillbespilled
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bloodwillbespilled/
Indie DB:    http://www.indiedb.com/games/blood-will-be-spilled
